vālikārāma： vālikārāma（pu）
ဝါလိကာရာမ（ပု）
«vālikā+ārāma»
[ဝါလိကာ+အာရာမ]

Vālikārāma：A monastery in Vesāli，where the question of the Ten Points raised by the Vajjiputta monks was settled．

（Vin．ii．306； Mhv．iv．50，63； according to Dpv．v．29 this was done in the Kūtāgārasāla）．

It was also the dwelling place of Upāli，Dāsaka’s teacher．

（Mhv．v．107）．v．l．Vālukārāma．
